statements: SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, address FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT last_name, address FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients, AVG(age) AS average_age FROM patients;
SELECT DISTINCT age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, dob FROM patients WHERE dob >= '2000-01-01';
SELECT address, phone_number FROM patients WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM medical_records ORDER BY date DESC, doctor ASC;
SELECT name, diagnosis, prescription FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'Flu%';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE name='John Doe';
SELECT patient_id, name, address FROM patients WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis='Influenza' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, doctor, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE prescription IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE patients.address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, address FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, first_name, last_name, specialty FROM Doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, m.diagnosis, d.specialty FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalRecords m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id JOIN Doctors d ON m.record_id = d.doctor_id;
SELECT p.first_name, m.diagnosis, m.date_created FROM Patients p LEFT JOIN MedicalRecords m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE m.diagnosis LIKE 'Cancer%';
SELECT d.specialty, COUNT(m.record_id) AS patient_count FROM Doctors d JOIN MedicalRecords m ON d.doctor_id = m.record_id GROUP BY d.specialty ORDER BY patient_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, contact_number FROM Doctors ORDER BY specialization ASC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, status FROM Appointments WHERE status='Confirmed';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalHistory.diagnosis, MedicalHistory.prescription FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id;

SELECT Doctors.doctor_name, Doctors.specialization, Appointments.appointment_date FROM Doctors INNER JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id WHERE Appointments.status = 'Confirmed';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Doctors.doctor_name, Appointments.appointment_date FROM Patients INNER JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id INNER JOIN Doctors ON Appointments.doctor_id = Doctors.doctor_id ORDER BY Appointments.appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_address FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Cold';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_address FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, prescription FROM Patients p INNER JOIN MedicalRecords m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE m.diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT patient_name, test_name, test_result FROM Patients p LEFT JOIN Tests t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id;
